name: Comments To ActiveCampaign
author: Haktan Suren

sections.description:
Major features in Comments To ActiveCampaign include:

  • Collecting (syncing) leads when user leaves comments to yor post.
  • Future Updates will include adding tags, entering automation and more :).

Check out the documentation

Comments To ActiveCampaign Needs Your Support

It is hard to continue development and support for this free plugin without contributions from users like you. If you enjoy using Comments To ActiveCampaign, find it useful and want us to develop further, please consider making a donation.

Please review if you like the plugin!

SPECIAL THANKS: (1) This plugin has been tested on various operating systems and browsers thanks to BrowserStack! (2) This plugins uses official ActiveCampaign PHP API Wrapper
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload comments-to-activecampaign folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory via FTP
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: The simplest way to collect leads from your comments to ActiveCampaign.
